50  template<class It>
51  class _const_iterator : public std::iterator<std::input_iterator_tag, Program>
52  {
53  friend class Program;
54  It _it;
55  std::shared_ptr<Memory> _memory;
56 
57  _const_iterator<It>(const It& it, std::shared_ptr<Memory> memory):_it(it), _memory(memory){}
58  public:
59  _const_iterator<It>(){}
60  _const_iterator<It>& operator++() {++_it; return *this;}
61  _const_iterator<It> operator++(int) {const_iterator dup(*this); ++_it; return dup;}
62  _const_iterator<It>& operator--() {--_it; return *this;}
63  _const_iterator<It> operator--(int) {const_iterator dup(*this); --_it; return dup;}
64  Program operator*() const {return Program(**_it, _memory);}
65  bool operator==(const _const_iterator<It>& other) const {return _it==other._it;}
66  bool operator!=(const _const_iterator<It>& other) const {return !(*this==other);}
67  };
68 
69 public:
70  typedef _const_iterator< Object::iterator > const_iterator;
71  typedef _const_iterator< Object::reverse_iterator > const_reverse_iterator;
72 
73  Program();
74 
78  bool isValid() const;
84  uint32_t tag() const;
